Architecture.description: Specifications for the types of EC2 instances that the capacity provider can use.
Architecture.markdownDescription:
Specifications for the types of EC2 instances that the capacity provider can use.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: x86_64 | arm64  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderPermissionsConfig.description: IAM permissions configuration for the capacity provider.

CapacityProviderOperatorRoleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role that Lambda assumes to manage the capacity provider.
CapacityProviderOperatorRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the IAM role that Lambda assumes to manage the capacity provider.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 10000  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:iam::\d{12}:role/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderPermissionsConfig.markdownDescription:
IAM permissions configuration for the capacity provider.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderPredefinedMetricType.description: The predefined metric for target tracking.
CapacityProviderPredefinedMetricType.markdownDescription:
The predefined metric for target tracking.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: LambdaCapacityProviderAverageCPUUtilization  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderScalingConfig.description: The scaling configuration for the capacity provider.

MaxVCpuCount.description: The maximum number of EC2 instances that the capacity provider can scale up to.
MaxVCpuCount.markdownDescription:
The maximum number of EC2 instances that the capacity provider can scale up to.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

ScalingPolicies.markdownDescription:
A list of target tracking scaling policies for the capacity provider.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderScalingConfig.markdownDescription:

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderScalingMode.description: The scaling mode for the capacity provider.
CapacityProviderScalingMode.markdownDescription:
The scaling mode for the capacity provider.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Auto | Manual  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderState.description: The current state of the capacity provider. Indicates whether the provider is being created, is active and ready for use, has failed, or is being deleted.
CapacityProviderState.markdownDescription:
The current state of the capacity provider. Indicates whether the provider is being created, is active and ready for use, has failed, or is being deleted.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Pending | Active | Failed | Deleting  
Update requires: No interruption

CapacityProviderVpcConfig.description: VPC configuration for the capacity provider.

SubnetIds.description: A list of subnet IDs where the capacity provider can launch EC2 instances.

items.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^subnet-[0-9a-z]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Architectures.markdownDescription:
The instruction set architecture for EC2 instances. Specify either x86_64 or arm64.

Type: Array

AllowedInstanceTypes.description: A list of instance types that the capacity provider can use. Supports wildcards (for example, m5.*).

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 30  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\.\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AllowedInstanceTypes.markdownDescription:
A list of instance types that the capacity provider can use. Supports wildcards (for example, m5.*).

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the capacity provider. This is a read-only property that is automatically generated when the capacity provider is created.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the capacity provider. This is a read-only property that is automatically generated when the capacity provider is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 140  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-zA-Z-]*:lambda:(eusc-)?[a-z]{2}((-gov)|(-iso([a-z]?)))?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:\d{12}:capacity-provider:[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

CapacityProviderName.description: The name of the capacity provider. The name must be unique within your AWS account and region. If you don't specify a name, CloudFormation generates one.
CapacityProviderName.markdownDescription:
The name of the capacity provider. The name must be unique within your AWS account and region. If you don't specify a name, CloudFormation generates one.

---

Update requires: Replacement
